description: A marketing company that help clients produce more entising emails.
myContributions: Migrated 200+ legacy Movable Ink apps to a new internal SDK. Build over 150 apps for various clients, using Movable Ink's intnernal SDK.

description: Implemented a solution that allowed business teams to incorporate advertisements on all major AMC Network's websites in an ongoing basis. The websites were for the following channels: AMC, BBC America, WETV, SundanceTV, and IFC.
myContributions: Lead, plan, and delegate the tasks. The project was delivered on time, with no major bugs. An iteration is in the works.

description: WonderstruckTV is a project built for BBC America. This is a platform that shows shortform videos of animals, nature, and other natural phenomenon. Studies have shown that watching nature content improves our emotional wellbeing.
myContributions: I coded the functionality and designs for the frontend of this application. I also made part of this application content manageable for editors.

description: This is a rebuild of my capstone project at Fullstack Academy. It takes a few ingredients and matches you to recipes with those ingredients.
myContributions: I partner with 1 other engineer to rebuild it with a more modern front-end stack.
stack: TypeScript, Tailwindcss, Vercel, Twillio, React, ReactQuery

description: BroadenMEdia is an application that calculates the political percentage of someone based on the media that they consume.
myContributions: I coded the design of the website using SASS.
